title: Best Practices: Securing Nomad
description: Scenarios that explore transport encryption and access control necessary to transition to a production Nomad configuration

courses.title: Encrypt Nomad Gossip Traffic
courses.description: Nomad uses UDP-based gossip for membership and liveness; secure it using symmetric key encryption.

courses.title: Encrypt API/RPC Traffic with mTLS
courses.description: Nomad can use mutual TLS(mTLS) to validate nodes are trusted and performing their expected roles.

courses.title: Enable Access Control in Nomad
courses.description: Nomad uses token-based access control to ensure that operators are only performing permitted tasks.
